section.title: RP 22 Part 1
section.paragraph: This problem will help you review the behavior of our SLang 1 interpreter.

section.title: RP 22 Part 2
section.paragraph: This problem focuses on the binding rules for our SLang 1 interpreter. To earn credit for it, you must complete this randomized problem correctly three times in a row.
